meanings.definition: A person who performs magic tricks for entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The magicians amazed the audience with their tricks.
meanings.sent2: We hired magicians for the birthday party to entertain the kids.
meanings.sent3: The magicians made a coin disappear in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a magician's spell, enchanting everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The magicians' performance was so captivating that no one wanted it to end.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in the art of illusion and sleight of hand.
meanings.sent1: The magicians' hands moved so quickly during the trick.
meanings.sent2: He trained for years to become one of the best magicians in the world.
meanings.sent3: The magicians' illusion left everyone scratching their heads in confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements on stage were like those of a magician.
meanings.sent5: The magicians' expertise in sleight of hand was truly impressive.
